summary: Completed testing of Calendar UI and Auto-Assign Authorities features. Calendar picker functionality works correctly with proper DD/MM/YYYY format, month navigation, and date selection. Backend API for suggested authorities returns correct data with snag counts. Some frontend integration issues found with Auto-Assign button visibility.

ui_bugs.issue: Auto-Assign button not consistently visible in create modal despite Building A having historical data

integration_issues.issue: Auto-Assign button appears inconsistently when building has history

passed_tests: Backend API: /api/buildings/Building A/suggested-authorities returns correct data
Backend API: /api/buildings/Building A/previous-authority returns authority info
Backend API: Create snag with due date saves correctly
Calendar UI: Calendar popup opens when clicking calendar icon
Calendar UI: Calendar shows month/year with navigation arrows
Calendar UI: Date selection works and populates DD/MM/YYYY format
Calendar UI: Clear date button works
Backend API: Suggested authorities endpoint returns John Authority with 6 snags

success_percentage.frontend: 80% - Calendar fully functional, Auto-Assign partially working

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix Auto-Assign button visibility issue in create snag modal. The button should consistently appear when a building has historical snag data. Backend API works correctly but frontend integration needs adjustment.
